name: Replication Data for: Birkeland Current Boundary Flows Associated with Field Line Resonance
description: Processed SuperDARN High Resolution (HiRes) data presented in the paper.

citation.text: Fenrich, F. R., R. Rankin, D. Sydorenko, W. E. Archer, D. J. Knudsen (2021), Birkeland current boundary flows associated with field line resonances, Journal of Geophysical Research Space Physics, submitted Nov 2020.

distribution.name: 20131219_0600_hires.dat
distribution.description: SuperDARN High Resolution (HiRes) data corresponding to 06:00 UT to 09:00 UT on Dec 19, 2013.  Columns: time (hours), magnetic longitude, magnetic latitude, east-west velocity (east positive), north-south velocity (north positive), line-of-sight flag.

distribution.name: 20140410_0726_hires.dat
distribution.description: SuperDARN High Resolution (HiRes) data corresponding to 07:26 UT to 09:33 UT on Dec 19, 2013.  Columns: time (hours), magnetic longitude, magnetic latitude, east-west velocity (east positive), north-south velocity (north positive), line-of-sight flag.
